page.title: 18The village Butcher _Bramley
page.content: { The village butcher is Joseph 'Eddie' {Green.}He was born in Bramley, and has lived in the area all of his life, _except during the Second World War _then his wife lived in Ravenfield. He learned the trade from his father. He buys beasts from a local farmer and then has them slaughtered at Doncaster Council Abbatoir, so cutting out the Wholesale person and improving his profits. The carcass is delivered to his shop where he cuts it up into joints etc. {The meat is sold fresh, directly to {the public. His day starts at about 8.00am and finishes at about 5.30pm.{He also sells such things as beefburgers, sausage, cooked meats, pork pies etc., {all of which are prepared or cooked on {the premises.
